patthana14.14:4.1: Sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.14:5.1: Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:5.2: Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:5.3: Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.14:6.1: Sāsavañca anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
